name: Emberharbor
economy_niches: timber prepping, caulking and treenail manufacture
culture_adjustments: fire-and-smoke symbolism prominent in local rites
guild councils exercise strong municipal authority
voyage oaths commonly sworn over embers and kiln-fires
tide-calendar offset by seasonal kiln/smelt schedule
pragmatic tolerance for ritual detritus tied to industry
constraints: scarce fresh water for saltworks and kilns
state ban on long-range mind-augury enforcement complicates some merchant rites
notes: center for ship-naming ceremonies and voyage-oath registration
apprenticeship certification required for shipwrights; fees often paid in kind
